title: What are some ways multiple characters can die at once? - Quora

response.answer_text: One, of course, is all of them being in a single deadly situation, such as a sinking ship or a crashing airplane, or building on fire or an explosion. Or a mass shooting. If you mean characters that are in different locations, you can have a pandemic, such as we are in now; coordinated assassination, such as in The Godfather II; a psychic or supernatural connection between them; a poisoning; an invasion with several skirmishes in different places; a group under attack and splitting up with decoys and several of them are targeted with varying successes, such as in Harry Potter.
